name: oclHashcat
desc: Runs the popular GPU password cracking tool oclHashcat to crack hashes using numerous different algorithms. Runs hashcat from the command line in a managed process and automatically gathers the results.

name: John the Ripper
desc: Runs John the Ripper to crack hashes using numerous different algorithms on resource server CPU.

name: Nmap: Network Mapper
desc: Runs Nmap scans of the network, parsing the results for the user. Includes numerous Nmap options for the user, and can use both preset and custom port lists.

name: Test Timers
desc: A pair of simple tools that simulate using either GPU or CPU resources to allow for consistent testing of CrackLord code.
